basics.name: Alberto Monge
basics.label: And Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a web developer that specializes in eCommerce development. Thanks to the hard work and dedication of the open source community, I have had the opportunity to hack on dozens of eCommerce platforms. I love helping entrepreneurs and pairing with other developers.

references.reference: Alberto is an extremely dedicated and java developer, never afraid to learn new techniques and always eager to try them. Once he gets his teeth into a problem he won let go until it's done! He does this with good humor and is a good chap to have around., I worked with the Alberto practical law on police. I myself am happily recommend him to as a, talented and dedicated engineer who worked with him. I certainly would recommend him to any team that values someone, dedicated and to delivering in his customers. I highly recommend him.
references.name: Brian Fitzgerald

references.reference: It was an absolute pleasure to work with Alberto at licks. Alberto has excellent technical skills with strong PHP, and mysql skills as well as a desire to learn and as much as ensure that he had a common goal.
